HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.missionDescription: Our goal is to make car rental simple, affordable, and reliable for everyone. We aim to provide the best service by bringing verified car rental providers and quality vehicles onto one platform.
HomePage.reliabilityDesc: We work only with verified partners and guarantee the condition of every vehicle.
HomePage.speedDesc: Fast and convenient online booking in just a few minutes.
HomePage.transparencyDesc: No hidden fees. All rental terms are clear and accessible.
HomePage.comfortDesc: A wide selection of premium-class vehicles for your convenience.

HomePage.futureDesc: Plans to expand the fleet, enter new regions, and introduce innovative services.
HomePage.whySubtitle: Your trusted partner in the world of premium cars.
HomePage.partnersDesc: We work with all leading car rental companies in Tajikistan to offer you the best selection.
HomePage.selectionDesc: From sports cars to SUVs ‚Äî find the perfect car for any trip.
HomePage.bookingDesc: A simple and fast booking process that saves your time.
HomePage.pricingDesc: No hidden fees. You only pay the price you see.
